subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Unbowed by the moment, unmoved by the Pacers’ size advantage, the Knicks blew the Pacers off the court with a stunning 23-0 run in the second half.
snippet: Unbowed by the moment, unmoved by the Pacers’ size advantage, the Knicks blew the Pacers off the court with a stunning 23-0 run in the second half.
